original_text: Now when the people of Israel grew strong, they put the Canaanites to forced labor, but did not utterly drive them out.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 강성한 후에야 가나안 족속에게 노역을 시켰고 다 쫓아내지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Now when the people of Israel grew strong
they put the Canaanites to forced labor
but did not utterly drive them out
